items.text: In some [[LINK|lang_en|Team_sport|team sports]], an **attacker** is a specific type of player, usually involved in aggressive play. Heavy attackers are, usually, placed up front: their goal is to score the most possible points for the team.
In [[LINK|lang_en|Association_football|association football]], attackers are also referred to as [[LINK|lang_en|Forward_(association_football)#Striker|strikers]].
